title: Author AFL flows using OO Workflow Designer
content:
This topic provides instructions on how to view and edit AFL entities authored in OO Studio. This includes:

  • displaying project structure in the Dependencies pane
  • viewing flow graphical representation in the flow GRAPH tab
  • viewing flow inputs, outputs, responses, scriptlets, and descriptions in the flow PROPERTIES tab
  • editing flow steps, responses, and flow properties, and add or delete transitions
  • viewing step level information for each step in the Inspector pane

Related topics

  • To view AFL flow details, see View AFL flows in OO Workflow Designer.
  • To edit AFL flow, see Edit AFL flows in OO Workflow Designer.
  • To view AFL flow step and transition details, see View step details in AFL flows.
